international and political studies kierunek realizowany języku angielskim łączy wiedzę obszaru stosunków międzynarodowych nauk polityce ekonomicznych studiów kulturowych porusza zagadnienia wielowymiarowości zjawisk procesów funkcjonowania organizacji instytucji krajowych międzynarodowych zajmujących szeroko pojętymi aspektami polityki proponowane specjalności kandydaci studia muszą posługiwać językiem angielskim poziomie średniozaawansowanym kierunku obwiązują przedmioty conflict cooperation security in politics international orders in historical perspective introduction cultural studies introduction international studies introduction political studies international organizations political economy in international affairs

the programme of international relations and public diplomacy is concept which allows students complete studies for two semesters at the jagiellonian university in krakow and two semesters at the university of siena in italy it focuses acquiring knowledge combining the issues of analysis of both international relations and state activities in the external sphere and adapting the possessed knowledge and skills with particular emphasis the importance of public diplomacy political economic cultural both at the level of global and regional institutions and state and organizations persons eligible apply for the programme are holders of higher education diploma at least undergraduate in any field main obligatory subjects public diplomacy world politics since international economics global comparative politics international law and human rights

animal science speciality bioengineering in animal science studia stacjonarne ii stopnia magisterskie kierunku zootechnika animal science specjalność bioengineering in animal science głównym celem studiów szkolenie specjalistów posiadających wiedzę umiejętności zakresie planowania organizacji hodowli inżynierii genetycznej diagnostyki molekularnej technik reprodukcyjnych metod hodowli komórek tkanek metod produkcji zwierzęcej the main goal of bioengineering in animal science is train specialists with knowledge and skills in planning and organization of breeding ii genetic engineering and molecular diagnostics iii reproduction biotechniques such as in vitro fertilization methods microsurgery methods of oocyte fertilization embryo culture methods extracorporeal maturation of embryos animal cloning transgenesis cryopreservation of oocytes and embryos cytogenetic and molecular methods used in genetic diagnostics iv cell and tissue culture methods and v methods of animal production the graduates are able communicate accurately with the various stakeholders in the verbal written and graphical form they can independently take decisions organize teamwork serve as managers as well as undertake establish and run their own business the graduates of this specialty can apply modern analytical methods used in research in the field of animal science they are prepared for professional career in research institutes especially related animal reproduction and animal science the supervision of breeding and insemination services farm companies agricultural advisory centres state and local government and many other institutions of broadly defined agricultural services and after completing pedagogical education can be employed in agricultural education the graduates are fully prepared for independent research and taking up the third degree studies phd propozycja kandydatów doskonale posługujących językiem angielskim wybrane przedmioty programie studiów zoologia ekologią the students of sustainability management can gain knowledge and practical skills within the courses related the environment including climate change and its consequences natural hazards water management problems waste management responsible management of environmental resources protection of natural ecosystems and biodiversity issues focused specific models of economic development and social life the impact of environmental changes social interactions management management and leadership as mechanisms of planning and implementation of tasks the graduates will be ready forecast and identify the most pressing problems of the contemporary world analyse them and evaluate ecological and human risks they will also be able design solutions various crisis situations in the human among others climate change natural disasters water resource deficits ecosystem transformation biodiversity reduction energy security etc the programme is addressed candidates holding high school diploma course structure introduction sustainable development population and sustainablility nature conservation and restoration earth system dynamics ecosystem services sustainable development policies sustainable agriculture gis for environmental analysis global climate change water global crisis natural hazards

the main goal of the business informatics bachelor studies program is deliver both theoretical and practical knowledge about applying computer science methods and tools in management and business studies provide graduates with practical skills in the use of software tools supporting business processes students will learn among others methods and techniques of analysis and design of information systems business applications database technology design and development of mobile applications methods of project management the graduate will have the skills analyze and synthesize business problems adapt changing conditions take up challenges related the implementation and use of modern information and communication technologies ict work in project team as well as the ability learn and update knowledge these skills will be acquired along with knowledge in the field of it management accounting finance quantitative methods and economics specialization the programme ist designed for students who want discover the world of bustiness informatics snd the field of management accounting finance quantitative methods and economics the chosen courses are run both polish and foreign practitioners lecturers in cooperation with business partners who use active teaching methods such as group work discussions business simulations brainstorming learning

communication management studies offer comprehensive approach external and internal communication of brands organizations and their image means of existing communication systems graduates of the program will have acquired theoretical knowledge and practical competences in the areas of specific aspects of communication of organizations and their external and internal image advertising public relations branding the graduates of this program will have an extensive knowledge social communication fundamentals of economy and consumer behaviors as well as vast project competences comprising the general area of image building and management in reference groups there will be special emphasis building communication competences teamwork and negotiating skills as well as techniques of effective and efficient communication practical skills connected with graphic designing in traditional and new media will also be very important element of the teaching program the course is dedicated graduates of other studies the core subjects public relations branding advertising design theories of communication lifestyle and consumer insights design management graphic fundamentals teamwork and team management media planning

target: international master program in management accounting
description: graduate of the international master program in management accounting will learn how conduct financial and analyses how apply internal audit resources and recommend appropriate solutions or internal controls become skilled in people performance management and project management students gain knowledge of economic legal ethical and other conditions of various types of professional activity related international business including the principle of industrial property and copyright protection this program is an offer graduates of the first major courses business ethics business law enterprise risk management framework in action financial analysis and working capital management financial strategy fixed term and equity financing group accounting under ifrs integrated reporting international financial reporting standards managing performance risk control and uncertainty management strategic management strategic management from available options optimal choices value enhancement technics

the programme of international relations and public diplomacy is concept which allows students complete studies for two semesters at the jagiellonian university in krakow and two semesters at the university of siena in italy it focuses acquiring knowledge combining the issues of analysis of both international relations and state activities in the external sphere and adapting the possessed knowledge and skills with particular emphasis the importance of public diplomacy political economic cultural both at the level of global and regional institutions and state and organizations persons eligible apply for the programme are holders of higher education diploma at least undergraduate in any field main obligatory subjects public diplomacy world politics since international economics global comparative politics international law and human rights

communication management studies offer comprehensive approach external and internal communication of brands organizations and their image means of existing communication systems graduates of the program will have acquired theoretical knowledge and practical competences in the areas of specific aspects of communication of organizations and their external and internal image advertising public relations branding the graduates of this program will have an extensive knowledge social communication fundamentals of economy and consumer behaviors as well as vast project competences comprising the general area of image building and management in reference groups there will be special emphasis building communication competences teamwork and negotiating skills as well as techniques of effective and efficient communication practical skills connected with graphic designing in traditional and new media will also be very important element of the teaching program the course is dedicated graduates of other studies the core subjects public relations branding advertising design theories of communication lifestyle and consumer insights design management graphic fundamentals teamwork and team management media planning

international relations and area studies programme is an undergraduate interdisciplinary programme that offers rigorous international and comparative perspective the contemporary global system and different regions of the world its aim is foster creative thinking about complex global problems and equip students with the analytical tools language expertise and understanding guide them in that process our degree provides solid grounding in international issues together with an opportunity specialise in international security or area studies research and teaching spans the full spectrum of topics in international relations and area studies including international politics and economics development global governance ethics of international affairs conflict resolution and peace building regional integration cultural diversity and intercultural dialogue specializations kierunek osób doskonale posługujących językiem angielskim kandydatów wyróżniać wysoka komunikatywność otwartość kultury ludzi zainteresowanie sprawami europy wybrane przedmioty programie studiów political philosophy and ir introduction politics and political science international political economy international relations in the century academic english research and presentation globalization and global governance political and economic geography theories of international relations human rights ethics and international affairs culture in international relations

eu energy and climate law is designed equip graduate students with comprehensive set of skills and knowledge necessary properly address the challenges of energy transition this requires not only an analysis of eu energy and climate law but also view the economic technological political as well as societal and philosophical background and implications of this process the holistic approach of the program will provide students with broad understanding of major issues shaping regulatory solutions of the eu energy and climate policy and ways of their implementation at the member states level the programme is dedicated graduate students with at least bachelor degree including international students and professionals and specialists who wish gain holistic knowledge of the eu regulations in energy and climate policy as well as the functioning of the energy sector energy transition and key implications of climate change program structure includes following courses eu energy law eu climate law energy transformation international dimension of energy and climate politics functioning of the energy market functioning of the natural gas market energy security energy market liberalization and the application of eu competition in the energy sector legal framework of the functioning of renewable energy sources legal framework of investments process in the energy sector state aid in the energy sector nuclear law

animal science speciality bioengineering in animal science studia stacjonarne ii stopnia magisterskie kierunku zootechnika animal science specjalność bioengineering in animal science głównym celem studiów szkolenie specjalistów posiadających wiedzę umiejętności zakresie planowania organizacji hodowli inżynierii genetycznej diagnostyki molekularnej technik reprodukcyjnych metod hodowli komórek tkanek metod produkcji zwierzęcej the main goal of bioengineering in animal science is train specialists with knowledge and skills in planning and organization of breeding ii genetic engineering and molecular diagnostics iii reproduction biotechniques such as in vitro fertilization methods microsurgery methods of oocyte fertilization embryo culture methods extracorporeal maturation of embryos animal cloning transgenesis cryopreservation of oocytes and embryos cytogenetic and molecular methods used in genetic diagnostics iv cell and tissue culture methods and v methods of animal production the graduates are able communicate accurately with the various stakeholders in the verbal written and graphical form they can independently take decisions organize teamwork serve as managers as well as undertake establish and run their own business the graduates of this specialty can apply modern analytical methods used in research in the field of animal science they are prepared for professional career in research institutes especially related animal reproduction and animal science the supervision of breeding and insemination services farm companies agricultural advisory centres state and local government and many other institutions of broadly defined agricultural services and after completing pedagogical education can be employed in agricultural education the graduates are fully prepared for independent research and taking up the third degree studies phd propozycja kandydatów doskonale posługujących językiem angielskim wybrane przedmioty programie studiów zoologia ekologią students of astrophysics will gain knowledge in mathematical modeling computer simulations and advanced data analysis they will also develop universal research competencies including analytical and critical thinking rigorous reasoning creativity and complex problem solving active learning as well as communication and teamwork skills the candidate is expected have knowledge and skills in academic mathematics and physics supported elementary competence in information technology apart from regular courses you will acquire specialistic knowledge and advanced practical skills working within of the research teams

target: physics of advanced materials for energy processing
description: physics of advanced materials for energy processing pamep is speciality of physics studies the program will be conducted solely in the english language with emphasis preparing its students for their future work as scientists or in areas the subject matter of the program is closely tied physics of new materials which currently have been applied or have its potential application in energy generation conversion storage and saving the goal of this program is equip student with technical expertise necessary for an academic career postgraduate degree studies or career in private sector corporations which strictly rely detailed knowledge of scientific research for instance companies involved in research producing or servicing advanced measuring tools and companies interacting with both science and the industry pamep studies will be conducted at the faculty of physics in close cooperation with the nanobiomedical centre and the faculty of chemistry at adam mickiewicz university in poznań poland pamep innovative way get sc degree in fields the graduate program offers classes strictly connected physics for instance solid state physics thermodynamics magnetism but also combined physics and chemistry for instance photovoltaics solar energy soft matter crystallography physics and biology for instance artificial photosynthesis bionanostructures and physics and nanomaterial engineering for instance conducting nanostructures and materials our students get familiarized not only with theories but also with experimental methods of materials research additionally they participate in specialized courses exploring the advanced modern material characterization techniques for instance electron and atomic force microscopy optical spectroscopy spectroscopy raman spectroscopy nmr spectroscopy laser spectroscopy neutron scattering material fabrication for instance lithography thin film deposition chemical methods and theoretical computation or computer simulation methods applied in materials physic propozycja kandydatów ścisłych umysłach zainteresowanych nowoczesnymi technologiami wybrane przedmioty programie studiów signal and energy processing in nanopatterned materials physical properties of and materials and their application in low energy consuming electronic devices biophotovoltaic materials thermodynamics of electrolyte solutions and in nanomaterials doped with lanthanide ions magnetism magnetic materials and magnetization dynamics introduction computational studies of electronic structure of nanosystems electric and thermoelectric transport at the nanoscale

the studies technical physics are closely related the development of modern technologies and the education of highly qualified personnel for the medical it analytical and materials sectors the student will learn about the physical basics of medical diagnostic and therapeutic devices learn about devices used in diagnostics ultrasound tomography resonance and medical therapy and nuclear devices and the principles of their safe use there are three specialities choose the course is dedicated for students seeking for practical knowledge of applied physics for medical practice courses students learn fundamentals of physics physics revisions technical mechanics mathematical methods of physics fundamentals of quantum physics atomic physics nuclear physics thermodynamics

communication management studies offer comprehensive approach external and internal communication of brands organizations and their image means of existing communication systems graduates of the program will have acquired theoretical knowledge and practical competences in the areas of specific aspects of communication of organizations and their external and internal image advertising public relations branding the graduates of this program will have an extensive knowledge social communication fundamentals of economy and consumer behaviors as well as vast project competences comprising the general area of image building and management in reference groups there will be special emphasis building communication competences teamwork and negotiating skills as well as techniques of effective and efficient communication practical skills connected with graphic designing in traditional and new media will also be very important element of the teaching program the course is dedicated graduates of other studies the core subjects public relations branding advertising design theories of communication lifestyle and consumer insights design management graphic fundamentals teamwork and team management media planning

international relations and area studies programme is an undergraduate interdisciplinary programme that offers rigorous international and comparative perspective the contemporary global system and different regions of the world its aim is foster creative thinking about complex global problems and equip students with the analytical tools language expertise and understanding guide them in that process our degree provides solid grounding in international issues together with an opportunity specialise in international security or area studies research and teaching spans the full spectrum of topics in international relations and area studies including international politics and economics development global governance ethics of international affairs conflict resolution and peace building regional integration cultural diversity and intercultural dialogue specializations kierunek osób doskonale posługujących językiem angielskim kandydatów wyróżniać wysoka komunikatywność otwartość kultury ludzi zainteresowanie sprawami europy wybrane przedmioty programie studiów political philosophy and ir introduction politics and political science international political economy international relations in the century academic english research and presentation globalization and global governance political and economic geography theories of international relations human rights ethics and international affairs culture in international relations

it cyber security combines knowledge of computer science with knowledge of political science and administration students learn about the place of cybersecurity in the contemporary understanding of security the complexity of security threats in cyberspace basic programming structures and rules of designing programming scripts standards for information security management principles of operation of cryptographic modules and the manner of their application in it systems and others it is second cycle programme the programme is addressed candidates holding bachelor degree or any other equivalent degree which grants direct access master s degree program program of studies linux operating system programming in python computer networks introduction cybersecurity threats in cyberspace it english terminology security of web applications secure programming computer networks security information war in cyberspace public international law and cybersecurity

the interdisciplinary nature of social and public policy program not only introduces students the workings of social and public policy but also makes them responsive the concerns of other fields such as law economics history and culture this program is taught entirely in english the program comprises six semesters the first two semesters introduce students the major concepts and theories of social and public policies in contrast the remaining semesters explore designing implementing and evaluating policies related social and public issues the program is designed for students with strong interest in making difference in today world it seeks internationally oriented candidates who are creative motivated and ready embrace multicultural environment students learn political institutions in the eu countries economics sociology of social problems quantitative research methods redistribution policy and politics social care and social work welfare mix public services design policy analysis project management international and regional organizations fundraising

the main goal of the business informatics bachelor studies program is deliver both theoretical and practical knowledge about applying computer science methods and tools in management and business studies provide graduates with practical skills in the use of software tools supporting business processes students will learn among others methods and techniques of analysis and design of information systems business applications database technology design and development of mobile applications methods of project management the graduate will have the skills analyze and synthesize business problems adapt changing conditions take up challenges related the implementation and use of modern information and communication technologies ict work in project team as well as the ability learn and update knowledge these skills will be acquired along with knowledge in the field of it management accounting finance quantitative methods and economics specialization the programme ist designed for students who want discover the world of bustiness informatics snd the field of management accounting finance quantitative methods and economics the chosen courses are run both polish and foreign practitioners lecturers in cooperation with business partners who use active teaching methods such as group work discussions business simulations brainstorming learning

the course chemical engineering and technology includes general education in the field of basic chemistry general engineering activities and in the field of chemical technology and engineering concerning among others typical chemical and mechanical processes used in the chemical industry various physicochemical and analytical methods used assess the properties of engineering materials as well as the use of computer tools supporting design modelling and manufacturing graduates of studies in the field of chemical engineering and technology have systematic theoretically based general knowledge of the basic branches of chemistry as well as knowledge and engineering skills in the field of material engineering process engineering and chemical technology they know modern technologies for the production of various chemical products including ceramic composite and polymer engineering materials the degree holders can use modern methods techniques and tools for structure identification qualitative and quantitative analysis and assessment of the properties of raw materials and products it is good choice for those who want hold such positions as chemical engineer process engineer product engineer process industry designer equipment designer research and development engineer production specialist laboratory research specialist quality control specialist laboratory analyst chemical installation operator technological process operator technical and commercial advisor the study programme additionally gives the opportunity individualise the path of education in accordance with the student interests selecting thematic blocks specialities sustainable chemical technologies green chemical technologies eliminate waste improve production safety and its economics or engineering of polymeric materials polymers are ideal for all types of engineering applications replace traditional materials with much simpler materials for manufacturing while maintaining their desired properties

the energy and environmental engineering studies are conducted jointly two universities of agh university of science and technology and shibaura institute of technology the main feature of the joint studies is the orientation and specialization towards the design and optimization of modern energy systems the designing and manufacturing techniques of contemporary energy materials considering environmental protection hat distinguishes the course is the focus the global aspects of energy conversion including the preparation of graduates work in international teams face global challenges of energy and environment it is programme it is an offer those candidates who are aware of the role of energy engineering and its impact the environment as well as the development of the country subjects students learn general and sustainable chemistry mathematical modelling technical thermodynamics advanced heat and mass transfer modern solid state physics

target: energy systems in the built environment
description: studia kierunku energy systems in the built environment dostarczają wiedzy praktycznej dotyczącej stosowania systemów energetycznych miastach budynkach przygotowują zakresie wykorzystywania komputerowych metod analizy projektowania studenci wykorzystują zdobytą wiedzę rozwiązania problemów inżynierskich nowoczesnymi narzędziami metodami pracując interdyscyplinarnych zespołach okiem ekspertów praktyków studia ii stopnia trybie stacjonarnym prowadzone języku angielskim studia kierunku propozycja kandydatów dyplomem inżyniera pragnących poszerzać widzę zdobywać kwalifikacje zakresie projektowania praktycznego zastosowania systemów energetycznych aglomeracjach miejskich uwagi realizację zajęć języku angielskim oferta osób legitymujących dobra znajomością języka programie studiów znajdziemy przedmioty electrical power system advanced building and urban engineering monitoring modeling and simulation conventional and future energy sources principles of sustainable design building energy performance problem based learning pbl smart buildings and cities design thinking dt best practice in building and system design design thinking emerging solutions in sustainable urban development

the purpose of education in the field of metalcasting engineering cast for the advanced manufacturing industry conducted at the faculty of foundry engineering is prepare engineers with the ability use knowledge from basic disciplines metallurgy alloys with special properties metal and alloy processing science of casting materials and materials mold technology and casting defects thermal technology computer networks and computer simulation systems in technology students acknowledge manufacturing technologies numerical simulations modern and ecological moulding and core sands casting defects and testing technology of metals cast steel iron cast melting and casting theory of metallurgical and foundry processes properties of materials and test methods printing and reverse engineering the programme is offered graduates from bachelor studies subjects students learn properties of materials and test methods molds technology heat treatment of casting plastics and their processing reverse engineering casting defects and testing computer casting design optimalization

metallurgical engineering program is prepared offer specialized education in the field of modern extractive metallurgy it covers broad content in the field of metal production from the preparation of raw materials through the production of metal alloys obtaining an ingot it focuses the construction and principles of operation of the devices used in production as well as the techniques of the ongoing processes it enables gain the theoretical knowledge in the field of physical phenomena taking place during extraction processes and chemical reactions including their thermodynamics and kinetics the programme is offered graduates from bachelor studies subjects students learn physical chemistry extractive metallurgy of ferrous alloys metal casting metal forming thermodynamics of metals foundry technologies hydrogen and green metallurgy electrometallurgy
